Class Description
AbstractGradientMethod
Abstract class for GradientMethod.
AbstractMethod<T>
Abstract class implementing interface Method.
AbstractOneDimensionalMethod
Abstract class for OneDimensionalMethod.
Brent
Implementation of the OneDimensionalMethod interface based on Brent method.
ConjugateGradientMethod
Implementation of the GradientMethod interface based on the the conjugate gradient method.
DiagonalMatrix
Implementation of the matrix interface for a diagonal matrix.
Dichotomy
Implementation of the OneDimensionalMethod interface based on dichotomy method.
Fibonacci
Implementation of the OneDimensionalMethod interface based on Fibonacci method.
GoldenRatio
Implementation of the OneDimensionalMethod interface based on golden ratio method.
GradientDescentMethod
Implementation of the GradientMethod interface based on the gradient descent method.
GradientMethod
Interface extending this interface Method for multidimensional functions from Vector to Double.
Main  
Matrix
Algebraic two-dimensional matrix of Double interface
Method<T>
Function optimization methods interface.
OneDimensionalMethod
Interface extending this interface Method for one-dimensional functions from Double to Double
OneDimensionalTest  
Parabola
Implementation of the OneDimensionalMethod interface based on parabola method.
RegularMatrix
Implementation of a Matrix interface that stores values in full form.
SteepestDescentMethod
Implementation of the GradientMethod interface based on the steepest descent method.
Vector
Algebraic vector of Double
